message: how do I set profile bio page so that the text is readable?  Right now, my profile bio is very hard to read because there is no spacing or formatting.  html tags don't work on this page.  How do I fix this?
@docellis124 I've added some formatting so that you have spaces and urls. https://convore.com/users/docellis124/
Thank you, Leah.  My profile information is now readable.  That's great.  Thank you again.
